title: HoP 085 - Sky Writing - Astronomy, Astrology, and Philosophy
itunes:title: HoP 085 - Sky Writing - Astronomy, Astrology, and Philosophy
description: Ptolemy uses philosophy in the service of studying the stars, while philosophers of all persuasions evaluate the widespread practice of astrology.
